sections.title: Introduction & Task Definition
sections.summary: Presenter explains the goal: use Copilot to implement missing unit tests for AI-related endpoints (AI search and 'formal' search) to avoid regressions.
key_actions: Identify endpoints missing unit tests (AI search, formal search)
State the objective to implement unit tests

sections.title: Switch to Agent Mode and Create Chat
sections.summary: Switch Copilot to agent mode, create a new chat, select the 'AI search' context, and choose the model (GPT-5).
key_actions: Choose GPT-5 model (with option to switch models)

sections.title: Triggering the Task via Hashtag / Quick Action
sections.summary: Use a hashtag + task name quick action to directly request implementation of unit tests for AI search. Presenter notes there may be other available quick actions.
key_actions: Type hashtag and task name to access quick action (e.g., implement unit tests)
Select the specific quick action for AI search
ui_elements: Quick action list for AI search

sections.title: Copilot Analysis & Automated Work (Read, Build, Iterate)
sections.summary: Copilot reads the entire solution, identifies required tests, adds code, attempts to build, and iteratesâ€”this analysis and code-generation process takes time (approx. 2 minutes).
key_actions: Let Copilot analyze the solution codebase
Allow Copilot to generate new test code
Allow Copilot to attempt building the project/solution
Allow Copilot to modify dependencies as needed and iterate

sections.title: Build Outcome, Accept Changes, and Run Tests
sections.summary: After about two minutes Copilot added tests and tried to build; initial failures caused dependency additions, then a successful build produced two new unit tests. Presenter accepts the changes and runs tests via the Test Explorer, confirming the new 'products AI test' cases are present and passing.
key_actions: Run all tests / run the newly added tests
Inspect build output to confirm success

sections.title: Next Steps / Scale Up Suggestion
sections.summary: Presenter previews a follow-up scenario: expanding the request to check the entire solution for missing unit tests.
key_actions: Plan to request a broader 'check entire solution' analysis for missing unit tests

main_topics: Using Copilot (agent mode) to implement unit tests
Selecting AI search context and model configuration (GPT-5)
Automated code analysis, test generation, and iterative builds
Accepting generated changes and running tests in Test Explorer
Handling build failures via dependency additions
